titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Genizah Fragment TS AS 78.162 (Cambridge)
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 License.

note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers BM 1:1 - 5; 2:3 - 7. Joins TS AS 78.126 (Cambridge).
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C96888 and C96887

ab.w: ל Some traces visible above gap.ו

w.note: Perhaps a punctuation character ending preceding halakhah.

ab.w:
ל
Bit of string obscures traces of characters.
